Frequently Asked Questions

How long does it take to complete a roadmap?

Each roadmap shows an estimated duration based on 15-20 hours of study per week. You can adjust your pace based on your availability and learning goals.

Are the roadmaps suitable for beginners?

Yes! We have roadmaps for all skill levels - Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced. Each roadmap clearly states prerequisites and starts with foundational concepts.

Do I get a certificate upon completion?

Yes, you'll receive a NextWork certificate of completion for each roadmap. Many of our paths also prepare you for industry-recognized certifications.

What's included in each roadmap?

Every roadmap includes structured modules, hands-on projects, real-world scenarios, code reviews, community support, and lifetime access to materials.

Can I switch between roadmaps?

Absolutely! Your progress is saved across all roadmaps. You can pause one path and start another, or work on multiple paths simultaneously.

Is there instructor support?

Yes, each roadmap includes access to our community forums, weekly office hours, and code review sessions with experienced mentors.
